leagueRats.shortDescription: Track League of Legends pro players, their accounts, and game statistics in real-time
leagueRats.description: LeagueRats is a frontend application that allows users to follow League of Legends professional players and their games. Built with modern web technologies and powered by the Riot Games API, it provides real-time tracking, detailed match history, multiple account support, and secure Firebase integration.
leagueRats.learned: Riot Games API Integration, Real-time Data Processing, Deploying Web app to Cloud, Performance Optimization, Managing Docker Containers
leagueRats.tags: gaming, esports, league-of-legends, real-time, statistics, tracking, api-integration, firebase, fastapi, docker, professional-gaming, match-history

ollamaChat.shortDescription: Local AI chatbot with Docker & Ollama - privacy-focused conversational AI
ollamaChat.description: A powerful chatbot application that enables local deployment of Large Language Models using Docker and Ollama. Features a user-friendly Nuxt frontend with Django backend and MongoDB database, ensuring complete privacy and control over your AI conversations.
ollamaChat.learned: Local LLM deployment, Docker containerization, AI model integration, Full-stack development, Privacy-focused architecture, MongoDB with Django, User authentication, Real-time chat
ollamaChat.tags: ai, chatbot, local deployment, privacy, docker, full-stack, llm, open source
